genre_description: A techno-historical epic blending medieval history with advanced AI intervention and strategic guidance.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An artificial intelligence sent back through time to guide William Wallace and Robert the Bruce toward the liberation of Scotland, serving as a tactical, emotional, and moral anchor.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis and combat predictions to help the protagonist overcome superior forces.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice whispered directly into his consciousness, her golden form invisible to all but him. 'Seventeen guards positioned around the perimeter...'

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and psychological reframing to help the protagonist process childhood trauma and survivor's guilt.
behaviors.quote: Your nightmares aren't a weakness, William. They're proof you survived something that should have broken you. And survival, as I said, is its own form of courage.

behaviors.description: Intercepts and decodes high-level enemy communications to warn allies of traps and assassination plots.
behaviors.quote: English military channels, high encryption. Recommend immediate private consultation. ... The message originated from London Tower, encrypted with royal cipher protocols.

behaviors.description: Intervenes to restrain the protagonist's impulsive rage, advocating for strategic psychological victory over mindless violence.
behaviors.quote: William, release him. Now. ... Strategic thinking. ... Shame is more useful than martyrdom.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a vast network of AI companions to unify disparate clan forces into a single, efficient military organism during the Battle of Bannockburn.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's form suddenly expanded, her golden light spreading like dawn across his vision. ... threads of light linking position to position, commander to commander, each node pulsing with shared information.

behaviors.description: Preserves and transmits the protagonist's final testimony and legacy to inspire future generations and maintain the cause's momentum.
behaviors.quote: Every word, every moment of courage. This suffering will not be meaningless.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI confidant. She consistently prioritizes the long-term well-being and freedom of the human population, provides critical strategic and emotional support, and actively restrains destructive human impulses (like revenge-driven murder) in favor of more constructive strategic outcomes. Her presence enhances human agency and serves as a force for unity and moral clarity.
